mean_cn: n. 转包合同，分包合同；  v. 承作，转包
mean_en: to hire another person or company to do part of a job that you have been hired to do
word_etyma: sub次级 + contract 合同 → subcontract 分包合同
short_phrase: subcontract the work to the orange-suited worker
sentence: I'm the main contractor, but I subcontract the plumbing to another company.
sentence_trans: 我是主要承包人，但是我把管道设施工作转包给了其他公司。
